name: reciprocation
content:

the fact of feeling or behaving towards someone else in the same way as they feel or behave towards you: Our relationship is based upon reciprocation. He didn't expect any reciprocation of affection. See
reciprocate
More examplesFewer examples"There has always been a reciprocation between audiences and dancers," she said.She had liked him for a while, but had never considered any possibility of reciprocation."We gave so much for you, where's the reciprocation?" he shouted.
